REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f2546 reute r f BC-union-bank-raises prime-to-7.75-pct 04-01 0037

TEXT.TITLE: UNION BANK RAISES ITS PRIME RATE TO 7.5 PCT
TEXT.BODY: The Union Bank subsidiary of Standard Chartered PLC said today it was raising its prime lending rate to 7.75 pct from 7.50 pct, effective immediately. Reuter
